page.title: 14Norwich Airport (cont.)
page.content: Nowich airport also has an Auiation Museum which includes the Vulcan Bomber which was used in the Falklands war. The old road to Cromer now runs through Norwich Airport but it isnÂ£t used anymore. The Airport has an important freight department. A model oilrig is used to train men to put out fires which could happen on an oilrig in the North Sea. Norwich Airport has a bird control unit.This consists of a Land Rover with loud speakers on which they play a birds distress call to scare the birds. A freight company called Anglia Air Freight uses the airport and their cargo usually consists of high value electronics or oil and gas equipment. The Airport has three marine pollution control tankers for dispersing oil slicks in the North Sea.
